name: 0 out of 5 Stars
description:
Zero Out of Five Stars is our GameJam project about making the worst dish possible.

You're a chef out to make your customers the unhappiest they can be, and using conflicting ingredients will net you some bonus points!

So grab your toothpaste and orange juice, because the orders are pouring in!

Made by Dallas Baker, Cody Bruckerhoff, Greg Burns, and Mason Scheible
